direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the class attribute of elements, but in opposite ways (adding vs. removing).
Both methods interact with the class attribute, but toggleClass adds or removes based on the presence of the class.
Both methods involve setting attributes on elements, with similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods modify attributes, but removeAttr specifically removes an attribute.
Both methods interact with attributes, but hasAttr checks for the presence of an attribute.
Both methods involve processing attributes, but eachAttr collects attribute values.
Both methods interact with the class attribute, but hasClass checks for the presence of a specific class.
Both methods involve modifying the structure of elements, but wrap adds an outer structure.
Both methods modify the structure of elements, but unwrap removes the parent element.
Both methods modify the content of elements, but empty removes all child nodes.
Both methods modify the structure of elements, but remove removes the elements entirely.
